Name: Shadow of Something
About the game: In the year 19XX, a mysterious disaster at the S-CORP lab forces the citizens of CITY S to abandon their homes and workplaces. Not long after, reports of strange phenomenon in the area emerged and crews of organized mercs and foolhardy looters began to stake their claims... Fight the other factions in CITY S for control of the experiments left behind, and establish your crews dominance in the ruins! A sprawling, immersive city to explore, filled with characters controlled by the revolutionary S-LIFE artificial life simulation technology. Infinite procedural quest generation. Three factions of city inhabitants to encounter. Over 5 usable weapons. State of the art weather systems. Full day / night cycle.
